author: bridge-bot
content:
<davidecrapis> re: **@gakonst**
> Haven't been able to engage with this group yet but wanted to share I am deeply appreciative of this workstream and Reth wants to support this / go ham
Thanks! Weâ€™ve been mainly focusing on two things

- trying to move forward changes in the short term, such as gas repricings for example 

- have some early discussions on bigger changes, such as multidimensional pricing, how things change if we account for proving costs. This is the more researchy part
